forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 14 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a bright, sunlit sky. A pleasant warmth dances with the afternoon breezes, as temperatures hover near 64 degrees, gradually slipping towards 62. The gentle but persistent winds, originating from the west-southwest, range from a nurturing 14 to a brisk 22 mph, sending playful whispers through the city streets. While the horizon emerges clear and inviting, the typical summer fog may loom close enough to remind those familiar with the Bay that the marine layer could stir in as evening edges in.

Tonight will bring a shift, as clouds gather and wrap the city in a cozy embrace. The temperature will settle down to around 54 degrees, accompanied by an encore of swirling winds that might stir the leaves in the evening air. Given these conditions, a light jacket or layered attire will serve you well, providing comfort as you wander through the twilight. Interspersing your evening with a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, or perhaps a serene visit to a quaint café, can make for a delightful way to engage with the city as it transitions into night. A peaceful ambiance awaits, rich with possibilities.
